name: Hidden Through Time: Definitive Edition
summary: Hidden Through Time: Definitive Edition promises light-hearted puzzling fun for all ages and even the entire family! It is a cute hide-and-seek/hidden object game with objects taken from different fantastical eras of our world’s history – from missing dinosaur eggs to ancient Egypt and the Wild, Wild West. It is the first hidden object game with dynamic, bubbling, and colorful hand-drawn & animated levels.
